clone.name: Clone
clone.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

createitem.name: CreateItem
createitem.description: Create an single item that is bound this this environment.

createlist.name: CreateList
createlist.description: Create a flat list of rows of items (i.e. like a owner draw listliew).

createrow.name: CreateRow
createrow.description: Create a rows of items (i.e. like a list from an owner draw list).

createtree.name: CreateTree
createtree.description: Create an tree of items (i.e. like a menu).

emitimagecode.name: EmitImageCode
emitimagecode.description: For each image, emit code based on template provided.

getimagecount.name: GetImageCount
getimagecount.description: Returns the number of images in the environment.

getimagename.name: GetImageName
getimagename.description: Returns a previously registered image (from a number - starting at 1).

getimagenumber.name: GetImageNumber
getimagenumber.description: Returns the number for an image.

newinstance.name: NewInstance
newinstance.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

setcurrent.name: SetCurrent
setcurrent.description: Establish context in which SetCurrent was called as the context for items.

clone.name: Clone
clone.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

createitem.name: CreateItem
createitem.description: Create a sub-item for the named item.

emitcode.name: EmitCode
emitcode.description: Emits code from the UI definition given a template.

getenvironment.name: GetEnvironment
getenvironment.description: Returns environment that item was created in.

issimple.name: IsSimple
issimple.description: Returns true if entry is simple text.

listcolumnsimple.name: ListColumnSimple
listcolumnsimple.description: Returns true if items in column are all simple (i.e. no embedded images etc).

movechildren.name: MoveChildren
movechildren.description: Move a block of Children items.

newinstance.name: NewInstance
newinstance.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

populatelist.name: PopulateList
populatelist.description: Create a flat list of rows of items (i.e. like a owner draw listliew).

populaterow.name: PopulateRow
populaterow.description: Create a rows of items (i.e. like a list from an owner draw list).

populatetree.name: PopulateTree
populatetree.description: Create an tree of items (i.e. like a menu).
